he total'money realised by exercise of options' from both stocks (Rs.cr) is 246.23.

This information can be found in the "Annexure to the Report of the Directors" document, which is a report on the stock option scheme and employee stock purchase scheme. The document provides a table with columns for the year, number of options granted or allocated, ITC employee stock option scheme, ITC employee stock option scheme - 2006, and total. The row for "money realised by exercise of options (Rs. in Crores)" shows a value of 246.23.
